snippet: Dragon Go is a voice-control app that can do things Siri can't, such as book a flight, make dinner reservations and find music on streaming services.
abstract: Dragon Go is a voice-control app that can do things Siri can't, such as book a flight, make dinner reservations and find music on streaming services.

headline.main: A Voice App Unapologetically Unlike Siri
headline.print_headline: For Siri, Competition That Doesn’t Talk Back
